src:
Nesreča zaprla pomursko avtocesto
Počilo je malo pred 12.30.
06 Nov 2019, 12:00 by T. V.
TURNIŠČE – Pomurska avtocesta je zaradi prometne nesreče, ki se je malo pred 12.30 zgodila med priključkoma Turnišče in Gančani proti Mariboru, zaprta. Nastaja zastoj.Za osebna vozila je možen obvoz po regionalni cesti Turnišče–Renkovci–Gančani, poroča prometnoinformacijski center.
text:
The accident closed the Pomurje highway
It started shortly before 12.30.
06 Nov 2019, 12:00 by T.V.
TURNIŠČE - The Pomurje highway is closed due to a traffic accident that happened shortly before 12.30 am between the Turnisce and Gancani connections to Maribor. There is a deadlock. For cars, a detour along the Turnisce-Renkovci-Gancani regional road is possible, the Traffic Information Center reports.
